dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Ahem~ Pray, pardon mine intrusion! I am a T Corp. Class 3 Employee of the Time Collections Agency! Thou must already be aware of our reason for visit, indeed?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Good morrow. Ah, mayhap 'tis already time to prepare for a luncheon for thee? It grieveth me to see a slow, unhurried breakfast denied... I understand thy pain.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg:
The best of the already wonderful list of employee benefits here at T Corp is, verily, the TT4 Protocol-activated sleeping pod!
Heh heh... The device permits me to enjoy a lengthy six-hour slumber over lunch, though only thirty minutes may have passed in the T Corp. Daily Standard Time!

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg:
Ah, thus approacheth the night. 'Tis quite mesmerizing, is it not? To watch as the beige sun creeps ever-closer to the horizon ere we depart from work...
Though I admit 'tis a shame that, once we clock out of work, the beauty soon gives way to utter darkness.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg:
There are many who fail to pay their dues in Time Tax, not to mention those who are caught 'finding' time in unauthorized manners.
Forsooth, we Collectors make sure to retrieve every debt that we are owed, with interest, so there is naught for thee to worry!

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg:
T Corp. Employment also ensures that thou shalt be bestowed with this watch-and-identification!
Pay heed to this little clockwork knob! Once I rotate this... I shall be bestowed with extra time to complete my missions!

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: To be allowed residence within a Nest, as a feather of a Wing no less, is quite the glory! I cannot rightly ask for any other work as honorable as assisting a Wing to ensure the just flow of time in the City!

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: The nature of 'time' is like a body of viscous fluid, indeed. 'Twas my impression upon collecting time; it very much resembled a stream or fluid as I drew it!

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg: Ah, thou wouldst like to know more of the clockwork machines I wear? 'Tis mine armor, an 'exoskeleton' for field missions. The safety of a collector must be guaranteed for a successful retrieval of time, no?

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Ah~ worry not thyself to keep me entertained! 'Tis only a brief moment for an employee of my Class. Go do whatever business it is that thou must see to, mind me not!

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Commencing Time Collections. Watch thy distance, lest thine own time be siphoned.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: A time defaulter, is it?! Get thine watches and collection pickaxes!

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Commencing Collections, now.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: No need to be hasty in thy speech! For I have all the ti— for I have a moderate sum of time in the world.

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: It shall be done!

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: There is aught else to collect from thee! Breathe not thy final breath!

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Agh...!

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Fie... target deceased. Collection status: inaccessible.

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: There is yet much time that must be collected...

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Another quest, handily completed!

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: Aah... 'twas not the wisest use of my time...

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: Mm, 'twas naught exceptional. Now that the necessary time has been collected, let us return.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Fie, I have collected more time than we were owed... Hm, yet... now that the defaulter has unfortunately perished, perchance it would be most just to return all of their remaining time to the T Corp. Time Vault, indeed!

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: My time collections rate is beneath the baseline...? Ah, thus I am become failure, a fool who knows not how to make the best of her time...
